tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE articles_cross_reference (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_title VARCHAR(255),
  article_source VARCHAR(100),
  bias_level ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
  reference_article_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (reference_article_id) REFERENCES articles_cross_reference(article_id)
)

CREATE TABLE article ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, source VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE bias_level ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, article_id INT NOT NULL, bias_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES article(id) );
CREATE TABLE articles (article_id INT PRIMARY KEY, article_title TEXT, source_id INT, bias_level INT);
CREATE TABLE sources (source_id INT PRIMARY KEY, source_name TEXT, source_bias TEXT);
CREATE TABLE article_sources (article_id INT, source_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id), FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES sources(source_id));

CREATE TABLE articles (article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 source_name VARCHAR,
 article_title VARCHAR,
 bias_level VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE bias_levels (bias_level VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY,
 description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE article_sources (article_id INT,
 source_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (article_id, source_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES sources(source_id));

CREATE TABLE article_bias_levels (article_id INT,
 bias_level VARCHAR,
 PRIMARY KEY (article_id, bias_level),
 FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (bias_level) REFERENCES bias_levels(bias_level));
